This only contains a subset of patients listed in the table. Refer to original sources for all data.

```{r packages}
library("tidyverse")
library("GenomicRanges")
library("BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg19")
library("here")
```

```{r}
# Location of sample GRanges
val_files <- readRDS(here("data", "selected_validation_files.rds"))
luc_files <- readRDS(here("data", "selected_lucas_files.rds"))

val <- val_files[which(val_files$patient_type == "healthy"),]
luc_h <- luc_files[which(luc_files$patient_type == 2),]
h <- rbind(val, luc_h)
dir.create(here("output", "supplementary_tables"), showWarnings=FALSE)
write.csv(h, here("output", "supplementary_tables", "tab1.csv"))

```
